access_control.epcis.filter
Class FilterHelper

java.lang.Object
  access_control.epcis.filter.FilterHelper

public class FilterHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods that help the access_control.Filter class The methods concerning the Mask or Transformation are not developed

Author:
OrangeLabs, Rabia Aziza
